long_description: This tacky Fizik Performance bar tape offers a firm grip and cushioned backing for comfort on your bike rides. Perforated Microtex is durable, strong, stretch resistant and breathable; features a "tacky" finish to enhance grip. Bar tape is padded with 3mm of cushioning for increased vibration dampening and comfort. Bar-end plugs are included.
short_description: This tacky Fizik Performance bar tape offers a firm grip and cushioned backing for comfort on your bike rides.
